original_text: I did not bring you animals torn by wild beasts; I bore the loss myself. And you demanded payment from me for whatever was stolen by day or night.
korean_text: 물려 찢긴 것은 내가 외삼촌에게로 가져가지 아니하고 낮에 도둑을 맞았든지 밤에 도둑을 맞았든지 외삼촌이 그것을 내 손에서 찾았으므로 내가 스스로 그것을 보충하였으며

sentences.original_text: I did not bring you animals torn by wild beasts
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 맹수가 찢은 동물을 가져오지 않았다

sentences.original_text: And you demanded payment from me
for whatever was stolen by day or night
